title: Best of The Herd: 08/31/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/31/2018
description:
Colin says last impressions matter and he thinks the one Baker Mayfield made Thursday night could be a big problem for the Browns. He talks with legendary broadcaster Al Michaels about the upcoming NFL season. Plus, Colin spoils your Saturday by telling you exactly what will happen in the biggest college football games. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
